title: How to Make Your Web App More Reliable and Performant Using webpack: a Yahoo Mail Case Study
description:
yahoodevelopers:

By Murali Krishna Bachhu, Anurag Damle, and Utkarsh Shrivastava

As engineers on the Yahoo Mail team at Oath, we pride ourselves on the things that matter most to developers: faster development cycles, more reliability, and better performance. Users don’t necessarily see these elements, but they certainly feel the difference they make when significant improvements are made. Recently, we were able to upgrade all three of these areas at scale by adopting webpack® as Yahoo Mail’s underlying module bundler, and
